original_text: You also must speak to people about me, because you have been with me from the beginning.’
korean_text: 너희도 처음부터 나와 함께 있었으므로 증언하느니라

sentences.original_text: You also must speak to people about me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희도 나에 대해 사람들에게 말해야 한다

sentences.original_text: because you have been with me from the beginning
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 너희는 처음부터 나와 함께 있었기 때문이다
